cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 425 miles south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the central Gulf, then turning north-northeast toward the southwest Louisiana coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: High Island, TX to Sabine Pass (Storm Surge Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: San Luis Pass, TX to Sabine Pass (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern and western Gulf Coast from the upper Texas coast eastward to Mississippi/Alabama
weather_observation.wind: Up to a 29% chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds (39–57 mph) Friday, with only a 7% chance of 50-kt winds; gusty easterly winds most likely.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft inundation possible for coast from Port O’Connor to High Island, which includes the Freeport area.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible as outer rain-bands brush the upper Texas coast Friday.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents; elevated seas that may disrupt vessel movements.
